data.title: News from Seattle Polish Film Festival – Seattle Polish News
data.text:
The Seattle Polish Film Festival welcomes back Dr. Michal Friedrich, one of the SPFF founders, as the Executive Director, who takes over from Zbigniew Konofalski, who was the Managing Director of the 2023 festival. Marlena Szymaszek, who was the Artistic Director in 2023, continues in her role for this year’s festival.

Opening of 32nd Seattle Polish Film Festival will be on November 9th, 2024, at Egyptian Theater with West Coast premiere of ” KOS”, a biopic of Tadeusz Kosciuszko directed by Paweł Maślona. The festival dates are November 9th-17th.

The Seattle Polish Film Festival awarded life achievement award ” Silver Salmon” to acclaimed movie director, screenwriter Agnieszka Holland. The award will be presented to Ms. Holland during the festival.

More: SPFF website
